definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out
head spinning and blurred vision/giddy/in a faint

sentences.english: Stand up every time giddy, feel dizzy . Be why?
sentences.chinese: 每次站起來就頭暈，眼暈。是爲什麼？

sentences.english: His laps around the dining room table are made at dizzying speed.
sentences.chinese: 它繞着餐桌轉圈撒歡兒的速度讓人看得直眼暈。
